summary: This document contains a report of incoming and outgoing wire transfers and checks, detailing transactions involving various financial institutions and individuals. It highlights significant amounts transferred and received, including transactions related to the Glickman Revocable Living Trust.

keyFacts: The document reports various financial transactions including incoming and outgoing wires and checks.
Significant amounts mentioned include $78000.00 and $1174279.34 related to Deutsche Bank.
Michael R. Haske and Nancy J. Haske are beneficiaries in a transaction involving LPL Financial.
John Gliogian and Karen Glickman are trustees for the Glickman Revocable Living Trust established in 2006.
The document is marked confidential under federal rules.
